message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $13,000. I think it would be very valuable to you and this is a fair price.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I don't want to break the bank. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is a tempting offer, I can't go quite that low.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $11,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $11,000. Can you consider my offer?
